atom3d.datasets.smp package¶

Submodules¶

atom3d.datasets.smp.add_cv_atom module¶

atom3d.datasets.smp.convert_qm9_from_sdf_to_hdf5 module¶

class atom3d.datasets.smp.convert_qm9_from_sdf_to_hdf5.MoleculesDataset(csv_file, sdf_file, name='molecules')¶

Bases: object

Internal data set, including coordinates.

write_hdf5(filename, indices=None, datatypes=None)¶

Writes (a subset of) the data set as compressed numpy arrays.

Args:

filename (str): The name of the output file. indices (int[]): The indices of the molecules to write data for.

atom3d.datasets.smp.convert_qm9_from_sdf_to_hdf5.convert_sdfcsv_to_hdf5(in_dir_name, out_dir_name, split_indices=None, datatypes=None)¶

Converts a data set given as CSV list and SDF coordinates to HDF5 train/validation/test sets.

Args:

in_dir_name (str): Name of the input directory. out_dir_name (Str): Name of the output directory. split_indices (list): List of int lists [test_indices, vali_indices, train_indices]

Returns:

ds (MoleculesDataset): The internal data set with all processed information.

atom3d.datasets.smp.convert_qm9_from_sdf_to_npz module¶

class atom3d.datasets.smp.convert_qm9_from_sdf_to_npz.MoleculesDataset(csv_file, sdf_file, name='molecules')¶

Bases: object

Internal data set, including coordinates.

write_compressed(filename, indices=None, datatypes=None)¶

Writes (a subset of) the data set as compressed numpy arrays.

Args:

filename (str): The name of the output file. indices (int[]): The indices of the molecules to write data for.

atom3d.datasets.smp.convert_qm9_from_sdf_to_npz.convert_sdfcsv_to_npz(in_dir_name, out_dir_name, split_indices=None, datatypes=None)¶

Converts a data set given as CSV list and SDF coordinates to npz train/validation/test sets.

Args:

in_dir_name (str): NAme of the input directory. out_dir_name (Str): Name of the output directory. split_indices (list): List of int lists [test_indices, vali_indices, train_indices]

Returns:

ds (MoleculesDataset): The internal data set with all processed information.
